sn1.77:1: "Kiṁsu issariyaṁ loke,kiṁsu bhaṇḍānamuttamaṁ;Kiṁsu satthamalaṁ loke,kiṁsu lokasmimabbudaṁ.
sn1.77:2: Kiṁsu harantaṁ vārenti,haranto pana ko piyo;Kiṁsu punappunāyantaṁ,abhinandanti paṇḍitā"ti.
sn1.77:3: "Vaso issariyaṁ loke,itthī bhaṇḍānamuttamaṁ;Kodho satthamalaṁ loke,corā lokasmimabbudā.
sn1.77:4: Coraṁ harantaṁ vārenti,haranto samaṇo piyo;Samaṇaṁ punappunāyantaṁ,abhinandanti paṇḍitā"ti.
